EmailTemplate.description: It sends an email to User Exam notifying which Exam result was .
EmailTemplate.name: SP Send Exam Result
EmailTemplate.subject: Exam Result : {!spExams__Exam__c.spExams__Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!spExams__User_Exam__c.spExams__Last_Name__c}, Here you have your Exam Result for {!spExams__User_Exam__c.spExams__Exam__c}
